details.top: Taariq al-Ashja'ee (radhi-yAllaahu 'anhu) said: When someone would embrace Islaam, The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) would teach him how to perform prayer and then order him to supplicate with the following words:
details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم اغفر لي، وارحمني، واهدني، وعافني وارزقني
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ، وَارْحَمْنِيْ، وَاهْدِنِيْ، وَعَافِنِيْ وَارْزُقْنِيْ
details.transliteration: Allaahummaghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wa 'aafinee warzuqnee.
details.translations: O Allaah, forgive me, have mercy upon me, guide me, give me health and grant me sustenance.

pageTitle: Excellence of Zikr & glorification of Allaah #9
